roadmap.title: Master Programming Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn a language like Python or Java, focusing on variables, loops, functions, and object-oriented programming to build a foundation for solving computing problems.

roadmap.title: Understand Computer Science Basics
roadmap.description: Study discrete mathematics, computer architecture, and operating systems to grasp the theoretical foundations of computing.

roadmap.title: Learn Data Structures and Algorithms
roadmap.description: Master arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and algorithms like sorting and searching to solve complex problems efficiently.

roadmap.title: Build Small Projects
roadmap.description: Apply your skills by creating projects like a to-do list app or a simple website to practice problem analysis and solution design.

roadmap.title: Learn Version Control with Git
roadmap.description: Understand Git and GitHub for version control, collaboration, and managing codebases effectively in team settings.

roadmap.title: Explore a Specialization
roadmap.description: Choose a focus area like web development or backend systems, and learn frameworks such as React or Spring Boot to design solutions.

roadmap.title: Understand Information Security
roadmap.description: Learn about software security, including secure coding practices and information security issues, to ensure ethical and safe software design.

roadmap.title: Work on Team Projects
roadmap.description: Collaborate on open-source projects or group assignments to enhance teamwork and communication skills in multidisciplinary settings.

roadmap.title: Build a Professional Portfolio
roadmap.description: Create a portfolio showcasing your projects, highlighting your ability to design and develop computing solutions.

roadmap.title: Prepare for Jobs and Continuous Learning
roadmap.description: Apply for entry-level roles or internships, and commit to life-long learning by staying updated with new tools and technologies.

roadmap.title: Learn Design Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Understand color theory, typography, and layout principles to build a foundation for creating visual solutions.
resources: Book: 'The Non-Designerâ€™s Design Book' by Robin Williams

roadmap.title: Master Design Software
roadmap.description: Learn modern tools like Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and Figma to create digital designs effectively.

roadmap.title: Study User Experience (UX) Basics
roadmap.description: Learn UX principles to design user-centered visuals, aligning with IT skills for integrating solutions into user environments.

roadmap.title: Create Sample Designs
roadmap.description: Design logos, posters, or UI mockups to practice applying design principles and tools.

roadmap.title: Learn Web Design Basics
roadmap.description: Understand HTML, CSS, and responsive design to create web-based visual solutions, aligning with BSIT web development skills.

roadmap.title: Explore Design Ethics
roadmap.description: Learn about ethical design practices, such as accessibility and inclusivity, to align with BSIT social responsibility outcomes.

roadmap.title: Collaborate on Design Projects
roadmap.description: Work with others to receive feedback and improve your designs, enhancing teamwork and communication skills.

roadmap.title: Build a Portfolio
roadmap.description: Compile your best work into a portfolio to showcase your ability to design visual solutions.

roadmap.title: Freelance or Intern
roadmap.description: Start freelancing or apply for internships to gain practical experience and apply IT-based design solutions.

roadmap.title: Engage in Continuous Learning
roadmap.description: Stay updated with design trends and tools, committing to life-long learning to remain competitive.

roadmap.title: Learn Programming and Statistics
roadmap.description: Master Python (NumPy, Pandas) and statistics (probability, hypothesis testing) to analyze data and solve problems.

roadmap.title: Understand Data Manipulation
roadmap.description: Learn SQL and data wrangling with Pandas to clean and prepare data for analysis.

roadmap.title: Master Machine Learning Basics
roadmap.description: Study regression, classification, and clustering using scikit-learn to build predictive models.
resources: Coursera Machine Learning by Andrew Ng (https://www.coursera.org/learn/machine-learning)

roadmap.title: Learn Data Visualization
roadmap.description: Use tools like Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Tableau to create visualizations and communicate insights effectively.

roadmap.title: Work on Data Projects
roadmap.description: Analyze datasets like the Titanic dataset on Kaggle to practice problem analysis and solution design.

roadmap.title: Explore Big Data Tools
roadmap.description: Learn tools like Apache Spark and Hadoop for handling large datasets, aligning with modern tool usage.

roadmap.title: Understand Data Privacy and Ethics
roadmap.description: Learn about data privacy laws and ethical data usage to ensure responsible data science practices.

roadmap.title: Collaborate on Data Projects
roadmap.description: Work with peers on Kaggle competitions or open-source projects to enhance teamwork and communication skills.

roadmap.title: Build a Data Science Portfolio
roadmap.description: Showcase your projects on GitHub, highlighting your ability to analyze and model data for real-world problems.

roadmap.title: Apply for Roles and Continue Learning
roadmap.description: Apply for data scientist roles and commit to life-long learning by staying updated with AI and data science trends.
resources: roadmap.sh AI and Data Scientist Roadmap (https://roadmap.sh/ai-data-scientist)

roadmap.title: Learn Software Testing Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Understand testing types (manual, automated, unit, integration) and quality assurance principles.

roadmap.title: Master Testing Tools
roadmap.description: Learn tools like Selenium, JUnit, and Postman for automated, unit, and API testing to utilize modern tools effectively.

roadmap.title: Practice Writing Test Cases
roadmap.description: Create test cases for sample applications, focusing on edge cases and risk-based testing.

roadmap.title: Learn Version Control
roadmap.description: Understand Git for version control to collaborate on testing projects and manage test scripts.

roadmap.title: Understand Software Security Basics
roadmap.description: Learn security testing basics, such as OWASP Top 10, to ensure software reliability and ethical practices.

roadmap.title: Explore Advanced Testing Techniques
roadmap.description: Study performance testing, load testing, and regression testing to ensure comprehensive quality assurance.

roadmap.title: Collaborate on Testing Projects
roadmap.description: Work with developers and testers on projects to improve teamwork and communication skills.

roadmap.title: Get Certified
roadmap.description: Obtain a certification like ISTQB Foundation Level to validate your testing skills and boost credibility.

roadmap.title: Build a QA Portfolio
roadmap.description: Document your test cases, automation scripts, and projects in a portfolio to showcase your skills.

roadmap.title: Apply for QA Roles and Continue Learning
roadmap.description: Apply for QA roles and engage in life-long learning to stay updated with testing trends and tools.
